module.title: verbs
module.p: Verbs are words which typically refer to intangible situations – events, states, activities, processes, changes of state &c.
Verbs can be divided into two morphological classes –

ul.li: Derived verbs are understood as having been formed from other verbs, adjectives or nouns eg. gealaich whiten, cuimhnich remember.
Simple verbs are not understood as having been derived from other words eg. ith eat, seinn sing.
